answers.answer: I have 31 days!  I'm so excited. She's measuring a week ahead and I have gestational diabetes so I'll probably be induced early(:
I have 40 days left.  Im really small so I feel like she will run out of room.. I give her 20 days or so... Just a feeling I have that she will be here early
19 more days left for me! Thank goodness! I feel like I'm about to pop lol!!37 weeks and baby measures at 36 1/2 so that's good :)

question: Not a question just really excited and I feel ppl not pregnant get bored with me cause I only want to talk about baby related topics glad I have you guys
title: 44 more days !!! ftm
